synopsis.text: Many brave adventurers, known as Cave Raiders, have dared to explore the depths of the Abyss, a vast and enigmatic cave system filled with mysterious creatures and ancient relics. Among them is Riko, an orphan girl living on the edge of the Abyss, who dreams of becoming a legendary Cave Raider like her mother and uncovering the secrets of the abyss. One day, while exploring the caves, Riko stumbles upon a robot boy with no memories of his past. Believing that the key to his origins lies deep within the Abyss, Riko and her new friend embark on a perilous journey to unlock the mysteries of the abyss and discover what lies at its bottom. But as they venture deeper into the darkness, they will face unimaginable dangers and uncover truths that may change their lives forever.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
